DOC.brief_summary: This multicentre , open label , pilot study evaluate safety efficacy Autologous Human Platelet Lysate ( HPL ) subject Facial Wrinkles ( Nasolabial Folds ) . The study conduct 2 center India . The primary endpoint Improvement Wrinkle Severity Rating Scale ( WSRS ) per ATLAS photographic grade rest full smile Global Aesthetic Improvement Scale ( GAIS ) . The secondary endpoint improvement photographic assessment , Physician 's assessment score , Patient 's assessment score form enrollment end study .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Determine Safety & Efficacy Autologous Human Platelet Lysate ( HPL ) Facial Wrinkles ( Nasolabial Folds )
DOC.criteria: Subjects ( male female ) , age 18 40 year ( inclusive ) . Subjects willing refrain treatment Nasolabial Folds . Subjects willing give inform consent adhere study protocol . Subjects receive aesthetic facial therapy 6 month prior enrolment e.g . Botox , Fillers etc Subjects history Connective tissue disease Subjects autoimmune diseases Subjects unwilling unable comply study protocol . Subjects take concomitant therapy might interfere study result investigator 's opinion participate another trial past 30days
